body_html:
For example, "alpha" in addmm is exported as a double, and in Caffe2, aten op looks for a float type attribute.

Scalars appear to either be translated into float or int, depending on the type of the overall operator.
body_text:
For example, "alpha" in addmm is exported as a double, and in Caffe2, aten op looks for a float type attribute.

Scalars appear to either be translated into float or int, depending on the type of the overall operator.
body:
> For example, "alpha" in addmm is exported as a double, and in Caffe2, aten op looks for a float type attribute.

Scalars appear to either be translated into float or int, depending on the type of the overall operator.
